name: The Mountain (SadFrenchman)
description: An expiriment thing I worked on that is so broken that there's no point in continuing it. It is also very difficult if you don't know what you're doing which is what will probably happen. So yeah. it's also like 5-10 minutes long with default assets so don't get your hopes up. If you somehow beat it you can roast my "Game" all you want.
